note.p: Engineer. Trained in the firm of Easton and Anderson and employed by them in waterworks construction. Resident engineer of the Antwerp Waterworks Company in Belgium from 1882; later manager and eventual chairman.
Copy book of Easton Devonshire, engineer 1882–3 (Felix-Archief, Antwerp: Antwerpse Waterwerken BE SA 43435)
Minutes and Proceedings of the Institution of Civil Engineers 193 (1913): 364
